author: Special Correspondent
text:

Meenakshi Amman Temple

East Avanimoola Street, Dhalavai Street, Ezhukadal Agraharam, South Avanimoola Street, East Masi Street, Vengalakkadai Street, Nethaji Road, South Chithirai Street, Velliambala Street, East Chithirai Street, North Chithirai Street, Sungam Pallivasal Street, Yanaikkal, Tirumalai Naicker Padithurai and North Veli Street.
